citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:55 pm on
25-OCT-18.
The licensee was contacted by calling the facility's telephone on file; optimal days and hours for inspections were
discussed and established.
